data.title: Sir Ben Kingsley Autograph
data.text:
comments

his father was Rahimtulla Harji Bhanji, a physician, and his mother was Anna Lyna Mary Bhanji, a fashion model

he was knighted in 2001 and received the title 'Sir' for his performing skills

1. marriage: with Angela Morant (1966 - 1972, divorced) and has two children from that marriage, Thomas and Jasmine

2. marriage: with Alison Sutcliffe (1978 - 1992, divorced) and has also two children from that marriage, Edmund and Ferdinand

3. marriage: with Alexandra Christmann (2003 - 2005, divorced)

and the 4.: he is now married to actress Daniela Lavender since 03. September 2007
